pages.app.title: Pages
pages.default.column:
A column

This text column lets you add content to your project. You can change its width by moving the border to the right or left. You can also drag and drop it to a new location.
pages.default.content:
Build your page

  • You can enter whatever information you like here: click inside a textbox like this one to edit content.​
  • Use the menu to the right of the application to drag and drop content onto your page.

Navigate on your page

  • The navigation bar on the left will update automatically as you add new pages.​
  • You can publish or unpublish your page at any time during the editing process to control who sees it.
